about_the_game:
THIS IS A FREE 15-TRACK SAMPLE COMPILATION.
Length: 49.54 min.
All files included are FLAC (lossless) files.

The full G String Original Soundtrack will contain:
128 tracks arranged into a seamless 5 hour and 42 minute long experience.
For convenience the mix has been divided into separate FLAC (lossless) files.

Copyright © Eyaura, 2020.
All Rights Reserved.
Permission is given to use music in this package in any YouTube videos, just credit the author and a link to the game's page is appreciated.

content_descriptors.notes: A few tracks meant to play during the fights in the red light district have a some sexually suggestive sound effects.

legal_notice:
The situations, entities, designs, concepts, characters, companies and locations in this project are all purely fictional. Any resemblance to real life persons, events or legal entities is coincidental.

No attempts have been made to defame or damage any real life persons or entities. All media in the G String project is original. No copyright infringement intended.
name: G String Sample Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: G String Sample Soundtrack

short_description: This is a free 15-track sample compilation from the original soundtrack of the upcoming game G-String.
